item.title: Never ever buy a movie from iTunes
item.description: Now this is getting ridiculous. When you buy a movie from iTunes you cannot watch this on your external screen. Yes, seriously. You can not plug in your second monitor, or your 1000$ 30” Apple Cinema Display, drag your iTunes window to that screen and hit play. It just won’t work. And apparently it’s due to a thing called High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection (HDCP). Something fancy that Apple added to all Macbook and Macbook Pro’s made after 2008.
